_PAGE_FILTER_LIMIT_TO_ARGUMENTS_TEXT_: The input string to be trimmed
_PAGE_FILTER_LIMIT_TO_ARGUMENTS_LIMIT_: The maximum length of the returned string
_PAGE_FILTER_LIMIT_TO_ARGUMENTS_MAX_THRE: Indicates whether to display at most three dots at the end of the string
_PAGE_FILTER_LIMIT_TO_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterLimitTo is used to limit an input string to a specific maximum length and optionally apply a special logic for ellipses at the end of the string.
